SELECT TA.* FROM ( SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TB.EMPNAME DESC) AS RNUM, TB.EMPID, TB.EMPNO, TB.EMPNAME, TB.DEPTNAME, TB.DEPTCODE, TB.EMPGRAD, TB.EMPGRADCODE, TB.EMPJIKW, TB.EMPJIKWCODE, TB.EMPHANDPHONE, TB.EMPTELPHONE, TB.EMPMAIL, TB.ADMIN_GUBUN, TB.EMP_STATE, TB.PRE_WORKINFO, TB.NOW_WORKINFO, TB.COM_NAME FROM (SELECT a.EMPID, a.EMPNO, a.EMPNAME, a.DEPTNAME, a.DEPTCODE, a.EMPGRAD, a.EMPGRADCODE, a.EMPJIKW, a.EMPJIKWCODE, a.EMPHANDPHONE, a.EMPTELPHONE, a.EMPMAIL, a.ADMIN_GUBUN, dbo.FN_DETAILCODENM(a.EMP_STATE) EMP_STATE, dbo.FN_DETAILCODENM(a.PRE_WORKINFO) PRE_WORKINFO, dbo.FN_DETAILCODENM(a.NOW_WORKINFO) NOW_WORKINFO, b.COM_TITLE AS COM_NAME
FROM TB_EMPINFO a , TB_SWCINFO b
WHERE AUTHOR_CODE != 'ROLE_USER'
AND a.EMPNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.searchKeyword},'%')
AND a.EMPID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.searchKeyword},'%')
AND a.EMPNO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.searchKeyword},'%')
AND (a.EMPNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.searchKeyword},'%') OR a.EMPID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.searchKeyword},'%') OR a.EMPNO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.searchKeyword},'%') )
AND a.AVAYA_USERID is null and a.EMPMAIL is not null
AND a.DEPTCODE= #{params.searchJobpst}
AND a.EMPID IN (SELECT ADMIN_ID FROM tb_admin WHERE AUTHOR_CODE = 'ROLE_ANONYMOUS')
)TB )TA
WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{params.firstIndex} + 1 AND #{params.firstIndex} + #{params.recordCountPerPage}
ORDER BY TA.EMPNAME ASC

SELECT a.EMPID, a.EMPNO, a.EMPNAME, a.DEPTNAME, a.DEPTCODE, a.EMPGRAD, a.EMPGRADCODE, a.EMPJIKW, a.EMPJIKWCODE, a.EMPHANDPHONE, a.EMPTELPHONE, a.EMPMAIL, a.AUTHOR_CODE, a.COM_CODE, a.EMP_STATE, CASE a.AUTHOR_CODE WHEN 'ROLE_USER' THEN (SELECT COM_PLAY_FLOOR FROM TB_COMPANYINFO c WHERE a.COM_CODE = c.COM_CODE) ELSE '' END as FLOOR_INFO FROM TB_EMPINFO a , TB_USERINFO b WHERE a.EMPNO = b.USER_NO AND b.USER_ID = #{params.userId} AND b.USER_PASSWORD = #{params.userPassword}
